diagnosis.differential_diagnosis: Non ST Elevation myocardial infarction, Hypertension, Anemia, Emphysema, Dyslipidemia
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient exhibited signs of gallstone pancreatitis, including epigastric pain, nausea/vomiting, leukocytosis (WBC 20K), and imaging evidence of choledocolithiasis with a large CBD stone. The patient underwent an emergent ERCP that successfully removed the stone, confirming the diagnosis of gallstone pancreatitis.
